content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, let me start with a proposal of 1350 Euros per month. I believe this luxurious, newly built one-bedroom apartment in the city center, with easy access to essential facilities, is worth it. However, I am open to negotiation if you have a different figure in mind.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your initial proposal, but I believe that the rental price for this apartment could be a bit lower. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and the need for potential renovations, I propose 1200 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I firmly believe the apartment's value justifies the higher price. We have invested significantly in its construction, and it is situated in a prime location with convenient access to essential amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, and I appreciate the quality and location of the apartment. Given your stance, I propose a compromise of 1280 euros per month as a fair price for both parties.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: After considering your proposal, I agree to the price of 1280 Euros per month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
